text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: dharmeNa te 'bhyanujJAtAH pANDavAH satyavikramAH
text.ur: dharmeṇa te ’bhyanujñātāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ satyavikramāḥ

text.ascii: ajJAtavAsaM vatsyantaz channA varSaM trayodazam
text.ur: ajñātavāsaṁ vatsyantaś channā varṣaṁ trayodaśam

text.ascii: upopavizya vidvAMsaH sahitAH saMzitavratAH
text.ur: upopaviśya vidvāṁsaḥ sahitāḥ saṁśitavratāḥ

text.ascii: ye tadbhaktA vasanti sma vanavAse tapasvinaH
text.ud: ये तद्भक्ता वसन्ति स्म वनवासे तपस्विनः
text.ur: ye tadbhaktā vasanti sma vanavāse tapasvinaḥ

text.ascii: tAn abruvan mahAtmAnaH ziSTAH prAJjalayas tadA
text.ur: tān abruvan mahātmānaḥ śiṣṭāḥ prāñjalayas tadā

text.ascii: abhyanujJApayiSyantas taM nivAsaM dhRtavratAH
text.ur: abhyanujñāpayiṣyantas taṁ nivāsaṁ dhr̥tavratāḥ

text.ascii: viditaM bhavatAM sarvaM dhArtarASTrair yathA vayam
text.ur: viditaṁ bhavatāṁ sarvaṁ dhārtarāṣṭrair yathā vayam

text.ascii: chadmanA hRtarAjyAz ca niHsvAz ca bahuzaH kRtAH
text.ur: chadmanā hr̥tarājyāś ca niḥsvāś ca bahuśaḥ kr̥tāḥ

text.ascii: uSitAz ca vane kRcchraM yatra dvAdaza vatsarAn
text.ud: उषिताश्च वने कृच्छ्रं यत्र द्वादश वत्सरान्
text.ur: uṣitāś ca vane kr̥cchraṁ yatra dvādaśa vatsarān

text.ascii: ajJAtavAsasamayaM zeSaM varSaM trayodazam
text.ur: ajñātavāsasamayaṁ śeṣaṁ varṣaṁ trayodaśam

text.ascii: tad vatsyAmo vayaM channAs tad anujJAtum arhatha
text.ur: tad vatsyāmo vayaṁ channās tad anujñātum arhatha

text.ascii: suyodhanaz ca duSTAtmA karNaz ca sahasaubalaH
text.ur: suyodhanaś ca duṣṭātmā karṇaś ca sahasaubalaḥ

text.ascii: jAnanto viSamaM kuryur asmAsv atyantavairiNaH
text.ur: jānanto viṣamaṁ kuryur asmāsv atyantavairiṇaḥ

text.ascii: yuktAcArAz ca yuktAz ca paurasya svajanasya ca
text.ur: yuktācārāś ca yuktāś ca paurasya svajanasya ca

text.ascii: api nas tad bhaved bhUyo yad vayaM brAhmaNaiH saha
text.ur: api nas tad bhaved bhūyo yad vayaṁ brāhmaṇaiḥ saha

text.ascii: samastAH sveSu rASTreSu svarAjyasthA bhavemahi
text.ur: samastāḥ sveṣu rāṣṭreṣu svarājyasthā bhavemahi

text.ascii: ity uktvA duHkhazokArtaH zucir dharmasutas tadA
text.ur: ity uktvā duḥkhaśokārtaḥ śucir dharmasutas tadā

text.ascii: saMmUrchito 'bhavad rAjA sAzrukaNTho yudhiSThiraH
text.ur: saṁmūrchito ’bhavad rājā sāśrukaṇṭho yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

text.ascii: tam athAzvAsayan sarve brAhmaNA bhrAtRbhiH saha
text.ur: tam athāśvāsayan sarve brāhmaṇā bhrātr̥bhiḥ saha

text.ascii: atha dhaumyo 'bravId vAkyaM mahArthaM nRpatiM tadA
text.ur: atha dhaumyo ’bravīd vākyaṁ mahārthaṁ nr̥patiṁ tadā

text.ascii: rAjan vidvAn bhavAn dAntaH satyasaMdho jitendriyaH
text.ur: rājan vidvān bhavān dāntaḥ satyasaṁdho jitendriyaḥ

text.ascii: naivaMvidhAH pramuhyanti narAH kasyAM cid Apadi
text.ur: naivaṁvidhāḥ pramuhyanti narāḥ kasyāṁ cid āpadi

text.ascii: devair apy ApadaH prAptAz channaiz ca bahuzas tathA
text.ur: devair apy āpadaḥ prāptāś channaiś ca bahuśas tathā

text.ascii: tatra tatra sapatnAnAM nigrahArthaM mahAtmabhiH
text.ur: tatra tatra sapatnānāṁ nigrahārthaṁ mahātmabhiḥ

text.ascii: indreNa niSadhAn prApya giriprasthAzrame tadA
text.ur: indreṇa niṣadhān prāpya giriprasthāśrame tadā

text.ascii: channenoSya kRtaM karma dviSatAM balanigrahe
text.ur: channenoṣya kr̥taṁ karma dviṣatāṁ balanigrahe

text.ascii: viSNunAzvaziraH prApya tathAdityAM nivatsyatA
text.ur: viṣṇunāśvaśiraḥ prāpya tathādityāṁ nivatsyatā

text.ascii: garbhe vadhArthaM daityAnAm ajJAtenoSitaM ciram
text.ur: garbhe vadhārthaṁ daityānām ajñātenoṣitaṁ ciram

text.ascii: prApya vAmanarUpeNa pracchannaM brahmarUpiNA
text.ur: prāpya vāmanarūpeṇa pracchannaṁ brahmarūpiṇā

text.ascii: baler yathA hRtaM rAjyaM vikramais tac ca te zrutam
text.ud: बलेर्यथा हृतं राज्यं विक्रमैस्तच्च ते श्रुतम्
text.ur: baler yathā hr̥taṁ rājyaṁ vikramais tac ca te śrutam

text.ascii: aurveNa vasatA channam Urau brahmarSiNA tadA
text.ur: aurveṇa vasatā channam ūrau brahmarṣiṇā tadā

text.ascii: yatkRtaM tAta lokeSu tac ca sarvaM zrutaM tvayA
text.ud: यत्कृतं तात लोकेषु तच्च सर्वं श्रुतं त्वया
text.ur: yatkr̥taṁ tāta lokeṣu tac ca sarvaṁ śrutaṁ tvayā

text.ascii: pracchannaM cApi dharmajJa hariNA vRtranigrahe
text.ur: pracchannaṁ cāpi dharmajña hariṇā vr̥tranigrahe

text.ascii: vajraM pravizya zakrasya yatkRtaM tac ca te zrutam
text.ud: वज्रं प्रविश्य शक्रस्य यत्कृतं तच्च ते श्रुतम्
text.ur: vajraṁ praviśya śakrasya yatkr̥taṁ tac ca te śrutam

text.ascii: hutAzanena yac cApaH pravizya channam AsatA
text.ur: hutāśanena yac cāpaḥ praviśya channam āsatā

text.ascii: vibudhAnAM kRtaM karma tac ca sarvaM zrutaM tvayA
text.ud: विबुधानां कृतं कर्म तच्च सर्वं श्रुतं त्वया
text.ur: vibudhānāṁ kr̥taṁ karma tac ca sarvaṁ śrutaṁ tvayā

text.ascii: evaM vivasvatA tAta channenottamatejasA
text.ur: evaṁ vivasvatā tāta channenottamatejasā

text.ascii: nirdagdhAH zatravaH sarve vasatA bhuvi sarvazaH
text.ud: निर्दग्धाः शत्रवः सर्वे वसता भुवि सर्वशः
text.ur: nirdagdhāḥ śatravaḥ sarve vasatā bhuvi sarvaśaḥ

text.ascii: viSNunA vasatA cApi gRhe dazarathasya vai
text.ud: विष्णुना वसता चापि गृहे दशरथस्य वै
text.ur: viṣṇunā vasatā cāpi gr̥he daśarathasya vai

text.ascii: dazagrIvo hataz channaM saMyuge bhImakarmaNA
text.ur: daśagrīvo hataś channaṁ saṁyuge bhīmakarmaṇā

text.ascii: evam ete mahAtmAnaH pracchannAs tatra tatra ha
text.ur: evam ete mahātmānaḥ pracchannās tatra tatra ha

text.ascii: ajayaJ zAtravAn yuddhe tathA tvam api jeSyasi
text.ur: ajayañ śātravān yuddhe tathā tvam api jeṣyasi

text.ascii: tathA dhaumyena dharmajJo vAkyaiH saMparitoSitaH
text.ur: tathā dhaumyena dharmajño vākyaiḥ saṁparitoṣitaḥ

text.ascii: zAstrabuddhyA svabuddhyA ca na cacAla yudhiSThiraH
text.ud: शास्त्रबुद्ध्या स्वबुद्ध्या च न चचाल युधिष्ठिरः
text.ur: śāstrabuddhyā svabuddhyā ca na cacāla yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

text.ascii: athAbravIn mahAbAhur bhImaseno mahAbalaH
text.ur: athābravīn mahābāhur bhīmaseno mahābalaḥ

text.ascii: rAjAnaM balinAM zreSTho girA saMpariharSayan
text.ur: rājānaṁ balināṁ śreṣṭho girā saṁpariharṣayan

text.ascii: avekSayA mahArAja tava gANDIvadhanvanA
text.ur: avekṣayā mahārāja tava gāṇḍīvadhanvanā

text.ascii: dharmAnugatayA buddhyA na kiM cit sAhasaM kRtam
text.ur: dharmānugatayā buddhyā na kiṁ cit sāhasaṁ kr̥tam

text.ascii: sahadevo mayA nityaM nakulaz ca nivAritau
text.ur: sahadevo mayā nityaṁ nakulaś ca nivāritau

text.ascii: zaktau vidhvaMsane teSAM zatrughnau bhImavikramau
text.ur: śaktau vidhvaṁsane teṣāṁ śatrughnau bhīmavikramau

text.ascii: na vayaM tat prahAsyAmo yasmin yokSyati no bhavAn
text.ud: न वयं तत्प्रहास्यामो यस्मिन्योक्ष्यति नो भवान्
text.ur: na vayaṁ tat prahāsyāmo yasmin yokṣyati no bhavān

text.ascii: bhavAn vidhattAM tat sarvaM kSipraM jeSyAmahe parAn
text.ur: bhavān vidhattāṁ tat sarvaṁ kṣipraṁ jeṣyāmahe parān

text.ascii: ity ukte bhImasenena brAhmaNAH paramAziSaH
text.ur: ity ukte bhīmasenena brāhmaṇāḥ paramāśiṣaḥ

text.ascii: prayujyApRcchya bharatAn yathAsvAn svAn yayur gRhAn
text.ur: prayujyāpr̥cchya bharatān yathāsvān svān yayur gr̥hān

text.ascii: sarve vedavido mukhyA yatayo munayas tathA
text.ur: sarve vedavido mukhyā yatayo munayas tathā

text.ascii: AzIr uktvA yathAnyAyaM punar darzanakAGkSiNaH
text.ur: āśīr uktvā yathānyāyaṁ punar darśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ

text.ascii: saha dhaumyena vidvAMsas tathA te paJca pANDavAH
text.ud: सह धौम्येन विद्वांसस्तथा ते पञ्च पाण्डवाः
text.ur: saha dhaumyena vidvāṁsas tathā te pañca pāṇḍavāḥ

text.ascii: utthAya prayayur vIrAH kRSNAm AdAya bhArata
text.ur: utthāya prayayur vīrāḥ kr̥ṣṇām ādāya bhārata

text.ascii: krozamAtram atikramya tasmAd dezAn nimittataH
text.ur: krośamātram atikramya tasmād deśān nimittataḥ

text.ascii: zvobhUte manujavyAghrAz channavAsArtham udyatAH
text.ur: śvobhūte manujavyāghrāś channavāsārtham udyatāḥ

text.ascii: pRthakzAstravidaH sarve sarve mantravizAradAH
text.ur: pr̥thakśāstravidaḥ sarve sarve mantraviśāradāḥ

text.ascii: saMdhivigrahakAlajJA mantrAya samupAvizan
text.ur: saṁdhivigrahakālajñā mantrāya samupāviśan
